ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisAppointment of YAPRAK BALTACIOGLU of Ottawa, Ontario, to be concurrently Deputy Minister of Transport and Deputy Head of the Office of Infrastructure of Canada, to be styled Deputy Minister of Transport, Infrastructure and Communities, to hold office during pleasure, effective July 1, 2009.
